info.title: Zappaz API
info.description: API for sending messages and managing webhooks

bearerAuth.name: Authorization
bearerAuth.description: User or Session token, directly passed as a string in the 'Authorization' header. The user token has scope over all sessions owned by the user. The session token is limited to the session itself.

messageOnCall.description: A message to be sent when a call is received. When messageOnCall is set, the call incoming call will be rejected and the message will be sent to the caller.

syncFullHistory.description: Whether to sync a chat's full history

markOnlineOnConnect.description: When set to true, as soon as a session is connected, contacts will always see the user as online.

clientConnectionName.description: The name of the client connection. This name is shown on the list of connected clients.

number.description: WhatsApp number to send the message to

mentions.description: (Optional) An array of JIDs or phone numbers to mention in the message

quoted.description: (Optional) Message ID of the message to quote

delay.description: (Optional) Delay in seconds before sending the message (typing...)

linkPreview.description: (Optional) Whether to include a link preview when a message contains a link

number.description: WhatsApp number to send the message to

source.description: URL to an image or raw base64 encoded image data (without any data URI scheme prefix like 'data:image/jpeg;base64,')

mentions.description: (Optional) An array of JIDs or phone numbers to mention in the caption

quoted.description: (Optional) Message ID of the message to quote

delay.description: (Optional) Delay in seconds before sending the message

number.description: WhatsApp number to send the message to

source.description: URL to a video file or raw base64 encoded video data (without any data URI scheme prefix like 'data:video/mp4;base64,')

gifPlayback.description: (Optional) Whether to send the video as a GIF

mentions.description: (Optional) An array of JIDs or phone numbers to mention in the caption

quoted.description: (Optional) Message ID of the message to quote

delay.description: (Optional) Delay in seconds before sending the message

number.description: WhatsApp number to send the message to

source.description: URL to an audio file or raw base64 encoded audio data (without any data URI scheme prefix like 'data:audio/mp3;base64,')

mentions.description: (Optional) An array of JIDs or phone numbers to mention in the caption

quoted.description: (Optional) Message ID of the message to quote

delay.description: (Optional) Delay in seconds before sending the message

number.description: WhatsApp number to send the message to

source.description: URL to a document file or raw base64 encoded document data (without any data URI scheme prefix like 'data:application/pdf;base64,')

mentions.description: (Optional) An array of JIDs or phone numbers to mention in the caption

quoted.description: (Optional) Message ID of the message to quote

delay.description: (Optional) Delay in seconds before sending the message

number.description: WhatsApp number to send the message to

delay.description: (Optional) Delay in seconds before sending the message (typing...)

number.description: WhatsApp number to send the message to

url.description: URL where webhook events will be sent

displayName.description: Optional display name for the webhook

events.description: Configuration of which events this webhook subscribes to

headers.description: Custom headers to be sent with webhook requests

waSessionId.description: ID of the WhatsApp session this webhook belongs to

description.example: This is a group for my friends

identifier.description: The phone number or group id of the contact or group to update the display picture for.

source.description: URL or base64 encoded string for the new display picture.

items.description: Phone number of a participant in international format without the '+' sign (e.g., '5511999999999')

GroupParticipantsArray.description: Array of phone numbers representing WhatsApp group participants

tags.name: Actions
tags.description: WhatsApp actions like profile management and contact operations

post.description: Sends a text message to a specified WhatsApp number.
Sends an image message to a specified WhatsApp number. The 'source' parameter can be either a URL to an image or a raw base64 encoded string of the image data (without any data URI scheme prefix).
Sends a video message to a specified WhatsApp number. The 'source' parameter can be either a URL to a video file or a raw base64 encoded string of the video data (without any data URI scheme prefix).

Sends an audio message to a specified WhatsApp number. The 'source' parameter can be either a URL to an audio file or a raw base64 encoded string of the audio data (without any data URI scheme prefix).

Sends a document message to a specified WhatsApp number. The 'source' parameter can be either a URL to a document file or a raw base64 encoded string of the document data (without any data URI scheme prefix).
Sends a contact message to a specified WhatsApp number.

Sends a location message to a specified WhatsApp number. At least one of either address or coordinates is required. When both are provided, coordinates take precedence. When latitude and longitude are not provided, we try to look up the address for you.

get.description: Retrieves all webhooks for the specified session

post.description: Creates a new webhook for the specified session

put.description: Updates an existing webhook for the specified session

url.description: URL where webhook events will be sent

displayName.description: Optional display name for the webhook

events.description: Configuration of which events this webhook subscribes to

headers.description: Custom headers to be sent with webhook requests

delete.description: Deletes an existing webhook for the specified session

get.description: Retrieves logs for a specific webhook with pagination and filtering options

parameters.name: status
parameters.description: Filter logs by HTTP status code

status.description: HTTP status code of the response

get.description: Retrieves a list of groups associated with the session.

description.example: This is a group for my friends

400.description: Invalid request or session not found

post.description: Creates a new group for the session.

description.example: This is a group for my friends

put.description: Updates group details such as subject, description, and admin settings.

description.example: This is a group for my friends

onlyAdminsCanPost.description: Whether only admins can post in the group

onlyAdminsCanEditInfo.description: Whether only admins can edit the group info

400.description: Invalid request or group not found

post.description: Sends an invitation to join the specified group.

message.description: Message to send with the invite

post.description: Adds participants to a WhatsApp group.

requestBody.description: Array of phone numbers to add to the group.

status.description: Status of the operation for each participant

post.description: Removes participants from a WhatsApp group.

requestBody.description: Array of phone numbers to remove from the group.

status.description: Status of the operation for each participant

post.description: Promotes participants to admin status in a WhatsApp group.

requestBody.description: Array of phone numbers to promote to admin.

status.description: Status of the operation for each participant

post.description: Demotes admins to regular participants in a WhatsApp group.

requestBody.description: Array of phone numbers to demote from admin.

status.description: Status of the operation for each participant

post.description: Retrieves the invite code for a WhatsApp group.

400.description: Invalid request or group not found

post.description: Revokes the current invite code and generates a new one for a WhatsApp group.

400.description: Invalid request or group not found
Invalid request or group not found

get.description: Retrieves the display picture for the WhatsApp session.

parameters.name: identifier
parameters.description: The phone number or group id of the contact or group to get the display picture for.

put.description: Updates the display picture for the WhatsApp session.
Updates the profile status (about) of the WhatsApp session.
Updates the profile name of the WhatsApp session.

get.description: Checks if the given contact JID is registered on WhatsApp.
Retrieves the 'about' information for the specified contact.

put.description: Blocks the specified contact by JID.
Unblocks the specified contact by JID.

get.description: Retrieves the current privacy settings for the specified session.

put.description: Updates the last seen privacy setting for the session.
Updates the online privacy setting for the session.
Updates the privacy setting for the session's profile picture.
Updates the privacy setting for the session's status.
Updates the privacy setting for read receipts in the session.
Updates the setting that controls who can add the session to groups.
Updates the default disappearing mode for messages in the session.
